markdownRemark.html: There are a few locations along the Coast where you can test your driving skills. You can try FunnyBeach in Marbella, the Karting area on the roof of the Myramar shopping centre in Fuengirola.

frontmatter.title: Kart & Fun Malaga (Plaza Mayor)

frontmatter.address: Calle Victoria de los Ángeles, 1, 29004 Málaga
